pull.title: refactor: Improve GetWitnessCommitmentIndex
pull.body: `GetWitnessCommitmentIndex` finds the last output index of coinbase transaction. Currently iterates all outputs. This change reverses iteration and so it only iterates all outputs at worst case.

events.body: Originally added in #8149 by @sipa. Got my attention while reviewing 3339d01af3e9c65f7a54b4f0e1c5194b5681dd71 from #18267.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18267 (BIP-325: Signet [consensus] by kallewoof)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Concept NACK.  I say this in every PR of this type: I don't think it makes sense to change consensus code unless we have some good reason to do so.  See also my recent [comment here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19518#issuecomment-665348923).
@sdaftuar it's fine. Just curious if it was intended to pick last element.
The bip says that the last element has to be picked

comments.body: Yup yup, forgot to fix this. Initially was bad because `o` is unsigned. Will fix.
Yes, need to change to signed. I'm fine with both TBH. Let's see what others say.
